This is a textbook for teaching a first introduction to data science. [...] This is an open source textbook aimed at introducing undergraduate students to data science. It was originally written for the University of British Columbiaâ€™s DSCI 100 - Introduction to Data Science course. In this book, we define data science as the study and development of reproducible, auditable processes to obtain value (i.e., insight) from data. The book is structured so that learners spend the first four chapters learning how to use the R programming language and Jupyter notebooks to load, wrangle/clean, and ...
